duties_responsibilities.duty: Assure agency compliance with 245D in all aspects of service delivery, including internal investigations, reviews, and documentation/implementation of plans of correction.
Facilitate the CARF survey each accreditation year, compile requested data, complete reports, and create/present CARF reports.
Supervise and train Residential Program Directors, ensuring high-quality service delivery and follow up on referrals.
Identify and accomplish department goals, establish new programs/developments, and manage budgets to assure compliance with funding streams.
Work in collaboration with Residential Program Directors to follow up on referrals and complete client service initiation, and serve as a contact for families and external stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: Experience with Minnesota Statute 245D and ideally with the Commission on Accreditation of Rehabilitation Facilities (CARF)
